name: YSL Loveshine Lip Oil Stick
about: What it is:Color of a lipstick, slip of an oil. Lipstick to oil hybrid with 6 nourishing oils to hydrate lips. Creamy buildable formula adds up to 24H hydration..Formulation Type:Lipstick / Lip Oil.Benefits:Hydrating, Long-wearing.Highlighted Ingredients:- Signature Oil Base 60%: Adds a smooth glide and moisturizing feel..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens and mineral oil..What Else You Need to Know:Experience the color of a lipstick with the slip of an oil. Now with six nurturing oils and a sleek silver look, this iconic formula provides up to 24 hours of hydration and protection. It melts into lips, hydrating on contact and making lips feel softer and more moisturized over time. Choose from an array of shades ranging from everyday nudes to pops of mauve and pink..Clinical Results:In a consumer test of 120 women, results showed:
ingredients: -Signature Oil Base 60%: Adds a smooth glide and moisturizing feel..-Fig Pulp: Is sourced from Yves Saint Laurentu2019s Ourika Community Garden in Marrakech, Morocco to make the formula suitable for sensitive/chapped lips...Diisostearyl Malate, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Phenyl Trimethicone, Synthetic Wax, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Cetyl Dimethicone, Octyldodecanol, Diisopropyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Phytosteryl Macadamiate, Pentaerythrityl Tetraethylhexanoate, Euphorbia Cerifera Cera Extract/Candelilla Wax Extract, Polyethylene, Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, Polyglyceryl-2 Isostearate, CI 77891/Titanium Dioxide, Paraffin, Passiflora Edulis Seed Oil, Cera Microcristallina/Microcrystalline Wax/Cire Microcrystalline, Hexadecene, CI77492/Iron Oxides, CI77491/Iron Oxides, Tocopheryl Acetate, CI 15850/Red 7, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, CI 77499/Iron Oxides, Aluminum Hydroxide, CI 42090/Blue 1 Lake, Silica, Tocopherol, Ficus Carica Fruit Extract/Fig Fruit Extract, Parfum/Fragrance.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Define lip contours with Touche u00c9clat All-Over Brightening Concealer Pen (sold separately) before applying lip color for extra definition..-Remove lipstick cap and twist bullet..-Apply directly, starting at center of lip and gliding toward corners of mouth.

reviews.review_title: Great pigment ruined by disappearing act
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Loved the pigment, goes on very smoothly. I really wanted to like this product because the color is fantastic. However, I hardly had this on half an hour and itu2019s gone. High cost, low durability

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Such a pretty everyday color with a nice scent. Minus one for the price
